document_data.name: Vjurn Blacktower
document_data.home: The [[Crypt of the Arisen Army]], [[Skull Gorge]]
document_data.mainbody: Baron '''Vjurn Blacktower''' was the head of the clergy of [[Velsharoon]] within the [[Crypt of the Arisen Army]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Vjurn Blacktower was a [[necrophant]]â€“a specialty priest of Velsharoon. Blacktower led a group of clergy called the [[Cryptskulls]] who haunted [[Skull Gorge]] and the neighboring [[Battle of Bones]].
